Package org.jgrapes.mail.events

Class SendMailMessage

java.lang.Object
org.jgrapes.core.internal.EventBase<T>
org.jgrapes.core.Event<Void>
org.jgrapes.mail.events.SendMailMessage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Future<Void>, Associator, Eligible
public class SendMailMessage extends Event<Void>
Indicates the arrival of a new message.

Handler should delete the message after successful processing.
